name: To Valhalla (ashashza)
description:
Be the first to return home to Valhalla by dying in glorious battle avoiding the nefarious healing powers of your opponents.

  • Created for Global Game Jam 2019. https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/valhalla
  • Supports up to 4 players.
  • Game controllers required.

Credits

Developers:

Ashley Peter

William Francis

 

Art:

Richard Ramsbottom
